1.content: You arrive to sweltering heat and get changed into cooler things. Once done you go out with a camera, blanket and some other things in a pack.
1.title: Choose your sex

11.content:
Sweat runs down your legs as you stroll along the trail that skirts the ocean. John sets a brisk pace with his stronger legs.

"I can't believe how beautiful this all is here, John. It makes me feel I'm on an island like those those topless Tahitian women in a Gauguin painting." you say smiling. You only wear a filmy top to cover your ample torso, under which your breasts bounce around in a colorful one-piece swimsuit.

You smile back. You both wanted to have sex since you left home two days ago but haven't had the chance. Perhaps NOW you have time to start your two week vacation on the right foot. A pleasant wetness in your groin makes you aware of your arousal. You notice John's slight erection under his shorts and smile at him broadly. You always were a tease but John liked to be teased and made to wait.


He stretches a hand out to your as an invitation to walk hand in hand and you accept.

You walk purposefully along and after some two hours with just a few breaks to drink water, you arrive at a split in the trail. A sign points ahead saying "Lagoon" and the other "Glade"

You want be fucked by him something fierce but first you have to choose which way to hike

121.title: To the Glade

You want a swim in the pool first.

122.content:
The path takes you along a gentle slope, punctuated by outlooks over the bay you are approaching. The final one has a soft, grassy covering and you stop for a moment to just admire the view. There is even a deep pool fed by water coming down a cliff for a swim, if you want to clean up afterward. Donna puts her hand on your rear end and looks at you and says:

"This looks like a perfect spot to stretch our muscles. Do you want to spot for a bit, John?"

You look at her expression and know EXACTLY what she means and smile back to her and her invitation to have sex right here.
122.title: To the Lagoon
